abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network

error.invalid_code: Invalid activation code. An activation code consist of 8 characters, separated by a dash, e.g. GBZT-HXC0.
error.no_longer_in_range: The lock is no longer in Bluetooth range. Move the lock or adapter and try again.
error.wrong_code: Wrong activation code. Note that an activation code can only be used once.

associate.description:
Provide an unused activation code.

To create an activation code, create a new key in the dKey admin app, then choose to share the key and share an activation code.

Make sure to close the dKey admin app before proceeding.

bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

reauth_confirm.description: The activation code is no longer valid, a new unused activation code is needed.

user.description: Choose a device to set up
